about.text: The Athena team is focused on building a fast and highly scalable implementation of a conflict-free replicated JSON data type. The main goal is to explore the use of CRDTs that deliver production level performance. AthenaDB [Work in Progress] launching Q2 2022 is a multi-node replicated distributed key-value store with strong eventual consistency built based on the core Athena conflict-free replicated JSON data structure that delivers industry leading performance.
